title: Rothamsted long-term liming experiment plans 1962-1996
description:
Standard experimental plans for Rothamsted long-term liming experiment, 1962-1996 showing plot numbers, layout and lime and fertilizer treatments.  

This dataset was partially funded by the BBSRC Institute Strategic Programme Soil to Nutrition (BBS/E/C/000I0310).

title: Rothamsted long-term liming experiments lime and fertilizer treatments 1962-1996
description:
Details of the lime applications, fertilizer treatments and basal fertilizer applied to the Long-term Liming Experiment at Rothamsted 1962-1996.  

This dataset was partially funded by the BBSRC Institute Strategic Programme Soil to Nutrition (BBS/E/C/000I0310).
